page.title: 03WIS. GREEN HORTICULT. SOC
page.content: People dress up for a Fancy Dress competition and also see who can throw an egg the furthest.A contest is also held to decide who will be "Miss Wisborough Green". Sports events play a major part in the show.There are children's races from one side of the green to the other,a three-legged race and a run of a mile round the green for men and women and one of half a mile for children. Finally. at the end of the show there is a big raffle with a large selection of prizes to be won.
